original_text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called Jesus, which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
korean_text: 할례할 팔 일이 되매 그 이름을 예수라 하니 곧 잉태하기 전에 천사가 일컬은 바러라

sentences.original_text: And when eight days were accomplished
for the circumcising of the child
which was so named of the angel
before he was conceived in the womb
